meaningMnemonic: <kanji>One</kanji> <kanji>scroll</kanji> is one scroll back in the day, but now it refers to books and means <vocabulary>one volume</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. いち goes to いっ.
